meta.title: Knight Network
meta.description: KnightSMP is a great server. We have different gamemodes and mainly theones are: Lifesteal and Kit PVP. Join our server, make friends and enemies. Become the best. Join crazy events like; End fight and otherfun events to win OP rewards. Here's our discord server:https://discord.gg/knightnetwork
